plot: Major Crime focuses on the police efforts to apprehend a sex offender. Detective Gordon Tallas's relentless pursuit of a dangerous sociopath seems doomed at every turn.
title: Major Crime
plot_es: Major Crime focuses on the police efforts to apprehend a sex offender. Detective Gordon Tallas's relentless pursuit of a dangerous sociopath seems doomed at every turn.
